channel.title: tetrahedron on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in tetrahedron on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Solved a couple puzzles today
item.description: 18:40 Tuesday 13 October 2015 JST I solved the chain tree and the tetrahedron today at the toy store. They both vexed me last week and maybe the week before. But today I was like rar and luckily solved the tetrahedron, and systematically solved the chain tree. I didn’t memorize either solution, but I probably won’t try to do them again, either.
